verses.verse: Peter, <WG4074> an apostle <WG652> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> to the strangers <WG3927> scattered <WG1290> throughout Pontus, <WG4195> Galatia, <WG1053> Cappadocia, <WG2587> Asia, <WG773> and Bithynia, <WG978>

Elect <WG1588> according <WG2596> to the foreknowledge <WG4268> of God <WG2316> the Father, <WG3962> through <WG1722> sanctification <WG38> of the Spirit, <WG4151> to obedience <WG5218> and sprinkling <WG4473> of the blood <WG129> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ: <WG5547> Grace <WG5485> to you, and peace, <WG1515> be multiplied. <WG4129>

Blessed <WG2128> be the God <WG2316> and Father <WG3962> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> which <WG3588> according <WG2596> to his abundant <WG4183> mercy <WG1656> has begotten <WG313> us again <WG313> to a lively <WG2198> hope <WG1680> by the resurrection <WG386> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> from the dead, <WG3498>
To an inheritance <WG2817> incorruptible, <WG862> and undefiled, <WG283> and that fades <WG268> not away, reserved <WG5083> in heaven <WG3772> for you,
Who <WG3588> are kept <WG5432> by the power <WG1411> of God <WG2316> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102> to salvation <WG4991> ready <WG2092> to be revealed <WG601> in the last <WG2078> time. <WG2540>

Wherein <WG1722> <WG3757> you greatly rejoice, <WG21> though now <WG737> for a season, <WG3641> if <WG1487> need <WG1163> be, you are in heaviness <WG3076> through <WG1722> manifold <WG4164> temptations: <WG3986>

That the trial <WG1383> of your <WG5216> faith, <WG4102> being <WG1096> much <WG4183> more precious <WG5093> than of gold <WG5553> that perishes, <WG622> though it be tried <WG1381> with fire, <WG4442> might be found <WG2147> to praise <WG1868> and honor <WG5092> and glory <WG1391> at <WG1722> the appearing <WG602> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ: <WG5547>

Whom <WG3739> having not seen, <WG1492> you love; <WG25> in whom, though now <WG737> you see <WG3708> him not, yet <WG1161> believing, <WG4100> you rejoice <WG21> with joy <WG5479> unspeakable <WG412> and full of glory: <WG1392>
Receiving <WG2865> the end <WG5056> of your <WG5216> faith, <WG4102> even the salvation <WG4991> of your souls. <WG5590>
Of which <WG3739> salvation <WG4991> the prophets <WG4396> have inquired <WG1567> and searched <WG1830> diligently, who <WG3588> prophesied <WG4395> of the grace <WG5485> that should come to you:

Searching <WG2045> what, <WG1519> <WG5101> or <WG2228> what <WG4169> manner <WG4169> of time <WG2540> the Spirit <WG4151> of Christ <WG5547> which <WG3588> was in them did signify, <WG1213> when it testified <WG4303> beforehand <WG4303> the sufferings <WG3804> of Christ, <WG5547> and the glory <WG1391> that should follow. <WG3326> <WG5023>

To whom <WG3739> it was revealed, <WG601> that not to themselves, <WG1438> but to us they did minister <WG1247> the things, <WG846> which <WG3739> are now <WG3568> reported <WG312> to you by them that have preached <WG2097> the gospel <WG2097> to you with the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> sent <WG649> down from heaven; <WG3772> which <WG3739> things the angels <WG32> desire <WG1937> to look <WG3879> into. <WG1519>

Why <WG1352> gird <WG328> up the loins <WG3751> of your <WG5216> mind, <WG1271> be sober, <WG3525> and hope <WG1679> to the end <WG5049> for the grace <WG5485> that is to be brought <WG5342> to you at <WG1722> the revelation <WG602> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ; <WG5547>
As obedient <WG5218> children, <WG5043> not fashioning <WG4964> yourselves according <WG2596> to the former <WG4386> lusts <WG1939> in your <WG5216> ignorance: <WG52>
But as he which has called <WG2564> you is holy, <WG40> so <WG2532> be you holy <WG40> in all <WG3956> manner of conversation; <WG391>
Because <WG1360> it is written, <WG1125> Be you holy; <WG40> for I am <WG1510> holy. <WG40>

And if <WG1487> you call <WG1941> on <WG1941> the Father, <WG3962> who <WG3588> without <WG678> respect <WG678> of persons <WG678> judges <WG2919> according <WG2596> to every <WG1538> man's work, <WG2041> pass <WG390> the time <WG5550> of your <WG5216> sojourning <WG3940> here in fear: <WG5401>

For as much as you know <WG1492> that you were not redeemed <WG3084> with corruptible <WG5349> things, as silver <WG694> and gold, <WG5553> from your <WG5216> vain <WG3152> conversation <WG391> received by tradition from your <WG5216> fathers; <WG3970>
But with the precious <WG5093> blood <WG129> of Christ, <WG5547> as of a lamb <WG286> without <WG784> blemish <WG299> and without <WG784> spot: <WG784>
Who truly <WG3303> was foreordained <WG4267> before <WG4253> the foundation <WG2602> of the world, <WG2889> but was manifest <WG5319> in these <WG3588> last <WG2078> times <WG5550> for you,

Who <WG3588> by him do believe <WG4100> in God, <WG2316> that raised <WG1453> him up from the dead, <WG3498> and gave <WG1325> him glory; <WG1391> that your <WG5216> faith <WG4102> and hope <WG1680> might be in God. <WG2316>

Seeing you have purified <WG48> your <WG5216> souls <WG5590> in obeying <WG5218> the truth <WG225> through <WG1223> the Spirit <WG4151> to unfeigned <WG505> love <WG5360> of the brothers, <WG5360> see that you love <WG25> one <WG240> another <WG240> with a pure <WG2513> heart <WG2588> fervently: <WG1619>

Being born <WG313> again, <WG313> not of corruptible <WG5349> seed, <WG4701> but of incorruptible, <WG862> by the word <WG3056> of God, <WG2316> which lives <WG2198> and stays <WG3306> for ever. <WG165>

For all <WG3956> flesh <WG4561> is as grass, <WG5528> and all <WG3956> the glory <WG1391> of man <WG444> as the flower <WG438> of grass. <WG5528> The grass <WG5528> wither, <WG3583> and the flower <WG438> thereof <WG846> falls <WG1601> away: <WG1601>
But the word <WG4487> of the Lord <WG2962> endures <WG3306> for ever. <WG165> And this <WG5124> is the word <WG4487> which <WG3588> by the gospel <WG2097> is preached <WG2097> to you.
